item.description:
Finalmente, Spring is here! Ecco la primavera!

This Winter put a damper on a few of our meetings but we are still very much alive. Â 
I invite you all to Springfield Mass for a morning of coffee and conversation!

We still meet at La Fiorentina in Springfield every 2nd Saturday of the month from 8:45am to 9:45am. We welcome all levels of Italian, so please don't be shy and come by!
item.how_to_find_us: We sit in the cafe area of the shop, usually on the left side. Look for the Italian dictionaries!
item.name: Mattina di cafe' e conversazione
